Package hac

Class PurchaseController

java.lang.Object
hac.PurchaseController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/purchase") public class PurchaseController extends Object
This controller is responsible for managing the purchases. adding/removing purchases clearing purchases
See Also:

  • PurchaseRepository

    • addPurchase

      @PostMapping("") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> addPurchase(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid Purchase purchase)
      This method is used to add a purchase to the database.
      Parameters:
      purchase - purchase object
      Returns:
      200 status code and the success message if the purchase is added successfully
